name: MechanicalCirculatoryAssistDevice
title: Mechanical Circulatory Assist Device
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for mechanical circulatory assist devices.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes ICD10PCS codes that represent procedures associated with mechanical circulatory devices used to support heart function.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
